The bad weather continues unabated, the Weather Warning has been extended
Discomforts and damages throughout Irpinia
03 Nov 2019, 15:50 by Redazione



In the next few hours, still particularly adverse weather conditions are expected, with strong thunderstorms, intense rainfall and strong libeccio winds due to a perturbation of Atlantic origin. A temporary improvement is expected starting tomorrow morning, in view of the new disturbances that should arrive between Tuesday and Wednesday.



The Civil Protection of the Campania Region, as always happens in these cases, recommends the competent bodies to maintain all the measures necessary to prevent and combat the phenomena in place and planned for the next few hours both in terms of precipitation and thunderstorms with consequent risk hydrogeological that in order to monitor the structures exposed to the stresses of winds and wave motion. It is therefore possible that in some areas the closure of the schools of every order and grade is arranged for the day of Monday 4th November, a decision that however must be taken by the mayor of the Municipality concerned and therefore varies from territory to territory.
